title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 13, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Sep 13, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Scala
items.content_text:
### Commercial courses / Devops

*   [Scala Algorithms](https://www.scala-algorithms.com/) - a collection of nearly 100 algorithms in pure-functional Scala with test cases, explanations and a web-based IDE. Built with http4s & Scala.js.
items.content_html:
Commercial courses / Devops

  • Scala Algorithms - a collection of nearly 100 algorithms in pure-functional Scala with test cases, explanations and a web-based IDE. Built with http4s & Scala.js.

items.title: Awesome Ironsworn

*   [Ironsworn Passions](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ytKHeNLHOIE8JvL3-TUyIu_pDdP2oS69HbwKNxQ4DuA/view) - Character desires and prejudices

items.title: Awesome Okr
items.content_text:
### Articles

*   [Learnings from implementing OKRs](https://rnjn.in/articles/learnings-about-okrs/): A great guide on implementing OKRs.

### Examples

*   [25+ Site Reliability Engineering OKR examples](https://www.cruform.com/site-reliability-engineering-okrs/): A comprehensive list of OKRs for Site Reliability Engineering Teams.
*   [GitLab: Objectives and Key Results (OKRs)](https://about.gitlab.com/company/okrs/): A comprehensive guide and real OKRs at GitLab.
*   [Measure What Matters: Examples & Resources](https://www.whatmatters.com/get-examples/): A list of OKR examples.

### Software

*   [Ally.io](https://ally.io/)
items.content_html:
Articles

  • Learnings from implementing OKRs: A great guide on implementing OKRs.

Examples

  • 25+ Site Reliability Engineering OKR examples: A comprehensive list of OKRs for Site Reliability Engineering Teams.
  • GitLab: Objectives and Key Results (OKRs): A comprehensive guide and real OKRs at GitLab.
  • Measure What Matters: Examples & Resources: A list of OKR examples.

Software

  • Ally.io

items.title: Awesome Fastapi
items.content_text:
### Auth

*   [FastAPI Azure Auth (⭐537)](https://github.com/Intility/fastapi-azure-auth) - Azure AD authentication for your APIs with single and multi tenant support.
*   [FastAPI Users (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/fastapi-users/fastapi-users) - Account management, authentication, authorization.

### Boilerplate / Other Tools

*   [FastAPI template (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/s3rius/FastAPI-template) - Flexible, lightweight FastAPI project generator. It includes support for SQLAlchemy, multiple databases, CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.

### Open Source Projects / Other Tools

*   [Bunnybook (⭐301)](https://github.com/pietrobassi/bunnybook) - A tiny social network built with FastAPI, React+RxJs, Neo4j, PostgreSQL, and Redis.
items.content_html:
Auth

  • FastAPI Azure Auth (⭐537) - Azure AD authentication for your APIs with single and multi tenant support.
  • FastAPI Users (⭐5.4k) - Account management, authentication, authorization.

Boilerplate / Other Tools

  • FastAPI template (⭐2.3k) - Flexible, lightweight FastAPI project generator. It includes support for SQLAlchemy, multiple databases, CI/CD, Docker, and Kubernetes.

Open Source Projects / Other Tools

  • Bunnybook (⭐301) - A tiny social network built with FastAPI, React+RxJs, Neo4j, PostgreSQL, and Redis.

items.title: Awesome Slim
items.content_text:
### Boilerplate

*   [Slim 4 MVC Skeleton (⭐81)](https://github.com/semhoun/slim-skeleton-mvc) - This is a simple web application skeleton project.
*   [Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐50)](https://github.com/adriansuter/Slim4-Skeleton) - Web application skeleton that uses the PHP-DI, Nyholm PSR7 and Twig.
*   [Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐452)](https://github.com/odan/slim4-skeleton) - This is a skeleton to quickly set up a new Slim 4 application.
*   [Slim Skeleton (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Skeleton) - The official Slim Framework 4 Skeleton Application.

### Middlewares

*   [Slim Basic Auth (⭐445)](https://github.com/tuupola/slim-basic-auth) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 HTTP Basic Authentication Middleware.
*   [Slim CSRF (⭐348)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Csrf) - Slim Framework CSRF protection middleware.
*   [Slim HTTP Cache (⭐116)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-HttpCache) - Slim Framework HTTP cache middleware and service provider.
*   [Slim JWT Auth (⭐828)](https://github.com/tuupola/slim-jwt-auth) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 JWT Authentication Middleware.
*   [Slim Minify (⭐37)](https://github.com/christianklisch/slim-minify) - Slim middleware to minify HTML output generated by the slim.

### Templating

*   [Slim Twig View (⭐367)](https://github.com/slimphp/Twig-View) - Slim Framework view helper built on top of the Twig templating component.
*   [Slim Plates (⭐26)](https://github.com/projek-xyz/slim-plates) - Render your Slim application views using Plates template engine.
*   [Slim PHP View (⭐269)](https://github.com/slimphp/PHP-View) - This is a renderer for rendering PHP view scripts into a PSR-7 Response object.

### Development

*   [Pest Slim Plugin (⭐5)](https://github.com/nekofar/pest-plugin-slim) - The Slim Plugin for Pest gives your basic functionality for testing.
*   [Slim Test (⭐5)](https://github.com/nekofar/slim-test) - Slim Framework test helper built on top of the PHPUnit test framework.

### Miscellaneous

*   [PHP-DI Slim Bridge (⭐175)](https://github.com/PHP-DI/Slim-Bridge) - PHP-DI integration with the Slim framework.
*   [Slim Config (⭐33)](https://github.com/DavidePastore/Slim-Config) - A file configuration loader that supports PHP, INI, XML, JSON, and YML files.
*   [Slim Console (⭐28)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Console) - Slim Framework Console.
*   [Slim Flash (⭐152)](https://github.com/slimphp/Slim-Flash) - Slim Framework flash messages service provider.
items.content_html:
Boilerplate

  • Slim 4 MVC Skeleton (⭐81) - This is a simple web application skeleton project.
  • Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐50) - Web application skeleton that uses the PHP-DI, Nyholm PSR7 and Twig.
  • Slim 4 Skeleton (⭐452) - This is a skeleton to quickly set up a new Slim 4 application.
  • Slim Skeleton (⭐1.6k) - The official Slim Framework 4 Skeleton Application.

Middlewares

  • Slim Basic Auth (⭐445) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 HTTP Basic Authentication Middleware.
  • Slim CSRF (⭐348) - Slim Framework CSRF protection middleware.
  • Slim HTTP Cache (⭐116) - Slim Framework HTTP cache middleware and service provider.
  • Slim JWT Auth (⭐828) - PSR-7 and PSR-15 JWT Authentication Middleware.
  • Slim Minify (⭐37) - Slim middleware to minify HTML output generated by the slim.

Templating

  • Slim Twig View (⭐367) - Slim Framework view helper built on top of the Twig templating component.
  • Slim Plates (⭐26) - Render your Slim application views using Plates template engine.
  • Slim PHP View (⭐269) - This is a renderer for rendering PHP view scripts into a PSR-7 Response object.

Development

  • Pest Slim Plugin (⭐5) - The Slim Plugin for Pest gives your basic functionality for testing.
  • Slim Test (⭐5) - Slim Framework test helper built on top of the PHPUnit test framework.

Miscellaneous

  • PHP-DI Slim Bridge (⭐175) - PHP-DI integration with the Slim framework.
  • Slim Config (⭐33) - A file configuration loader that supports PHP, INI, XML, JSON, and YML files.
  • Slim Console (⭐28) - Slim Framework Console.
  • Slim Flash (⭐152) - Slim Framework flash messages service provider.

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Tools / Testing Tools

*   [eslint-dashboard (⭐19)](https://github.com/fengzilong/eslint-dashboard) - Interactive ESLint workflow that lives in your terminal.
items.content_html:
Tools / Testing Tools

  • eslint-dashboard (⭐19) - Interactive ESLint workflow that lives in your terminal.

items.title: Awesome Dotnet Core
items.content_text:
### Frameworks, Libraries and Tools / Queue and Messaging

*   [Silverback (⭐270)](https://github.com/BEagle1984/silverback) - Framework to build event-driven applications (support for Kafka, RabbitMQ, MQTT).
items.content_html:
Frameworks, Libraries and Tools / Queue and Messaging

  • Silverback (⭐270) - Framework to build event-driven applications (support for Kafka, RabbitMQ, MQTT).

items.title: Awesome Scala Native
items.content_text:
### Bindings

*   [cairo-xlib (⭐0)](https://github.com/edadma/cairo-xlib) - Bindings for the [Cairo](https://www.cairographics.org/) 2D graphics [XLib Surfaces](https://www.cairographics.org/manual/cairo-XLib-Surfaces.html) with bindings for [XLib](https://www.x.org/releases/current/doc/libX11/libX11/libX11.html) as well.
items.content_html:
Bindings

  • cairo-xlib (⭐0) - Bindings for the Cairo 2D graphics XLib Surfaces with bindings for XLib as well.

items.title: Awesome Webxr
items.content_text:
### Art

*   [VARTISTE](https://vartiste.xyz/) - A VR app for 2D drawing and image editing, and 3D model texturing.

### Communities / Discord

*   [WebXR Discord](https://discord.gg/Jt5tfaM) - Official Discord server for all things WebXR, with over 1000 members.
*   [Wonderland Engine Discord](https://discord.gg/FE8QnDP) - Wonderland Engine Discord server.

### Communities / Facebook

*   [Immersive Web](https://www.facebook.com/groups/immersiveweb/) - Oldest WebXR-related group, originally made for WebVR.
*   [WebXR](https://www.facebook.com/groups/arvrweb/) - Slightly newer WebXR-centric group.
*   [WebXR Korea](https://www.facebook.com/groups/webxrko/) - Korean WebXR group created by Belivvr.
*   [WebXR Paris](https://www.facebook.com/groups/548527285323630/) - Companion to the WebXR Paris group on [Meetup](https://www.meetup.com/WebXR-Paris/).

### Communities / Forums

*   [Babylon.js Forum](https://forum.babylonjs.com/) - Official Babylon.js forum.
items.content_html:
Art

  • VARTISTE - A VR app for 2D drawing and image editing, and 3D model texturing.

Communities / Discord

  • WebXR Discord - Official Discord server for all things WebXR, with over 1000 members.
  • Wonderland Engine Discord - Wonderland Engine Discord server.

Communities / Facebook

  • Immersive Web - Oldest WebXR-related group, originally made for WebVR.
  • WebXR - Slightly newer WebXR-centric group.
  • WebXR Korea - Korean WebXR group created by Belivvr.
  • WebXR Paris - Companion to the WebXR Paris group on Meetup.

Communities / Forums

  • Babylon.js Forum - Official Babylon.js forum.
